faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.1a:
We have 2 types of users. On the one hand the users themselves and on the other hand the traders:
  • The users pay nothing and have all functions immediately available. There are no hidden costs.
  • The traders can make their business stand out by making special offers to the users, e.g. in the case of a restaurant, a free espresso with a turnover more than 30$euro;. The type of offers is left to the traders themselves.
faq.2a:
We want to gain maximum trust and are in no way out of collecting or selling data. We are convinced that users and traders will create a stable ecosystem on the basis of ${appTitle}, through which everyone has a great advantage and no disadvantages. That's why ${appTitle}'s source code is publicly available, so everyone can see what's stored in the code and how the data is further processed. You can find the source code here:
https://github.com/maniafschar
faq.3: How does your business model work?
faq.3a: Business Spontis can buy additional services. These are only actively shown to Spontis with matching attributes. There is no such thing as classic-style advertising.
faq.4: So do I see advertising everywhere in the app?
faq.4a: No. You will only be shown advertising if an offer from a trader matches your settings. You get offers e.g. only because you like to eat Italian, you are close to the place and it fits into your budget. Classic-style advertising is not shown.
faq.5a: No, we won't show your email to anyone. Your exact whereabouts will of course not be displayed either. Users can see that you are within 1.5 kilometers of them.
faq.6: Can I delete my profile again?
faq.6a:
You can easily delete your profile in the settings. The data is then completely and irrevocably gone, a recovery is not possible.
Despite the simple deletion option, our goal is to gain sustainable users who use our app in the long term and who are authentic. This simplified deletion process therefore primarily serves to build trust.

info.promoSender: This link is you sent by {0}
info.socialShareBrowser: Invite your friends via email or chat. We prepared a text, which you may copy & paste:
info.socialShareText:
Hey, I'm in ${appTitle} because of Bluetooth Matching, Guides, and Events 😎

It's fun strolling through the city and the app suggest Spontis with similar interests in your immediate vicinity! 😊

Wanna try it? ✌️😏
You'll find me in ${appTitle} as {0} {1}
info.url: Link for sending in other Apps like WhatsApp:
info.block1Title: What does everyday life look like without ${appTitle}?
info.block1_1: You mostly go to the same places
info.block1_2: You hardly meet new Spontis with same interests
info.block2_1: Like-minded, e.g. dog lovers or concert goers, find eachother quickly
info.block2_2: Guides show new perspectives on the city
info.block3_1: Bluetooth matching shows you Spontis with similar interests in your immediate vicinity
info.block3_2: Anyone can set up small events that are open to Spontis with the same interests

intro.bluetooth:
• If you open ${appTitle}, Bluetooth Matching scans your immediate surrounding for Spontis with similar interests. If there is a match, you will receive a message
  • There are many other ways in which we match, e.g. when a Sponti with the same interests looks at a location that you have saved as a favorite
  • Additionally Guide show Spontis with similar interests their view of your city
intro.bluetoothDescriptionBrowser: As soon as you have installed the app, you can find Spontis with similar interests in your immediate vicinity via Bluetooth matching. The browser doesn't support Bluetooth.
intro.bluetoothDescriptionLoggedOff: Log in to find Spontis with similar interests in your immediate vicinity via Bluetooth matching.
intro.bluetoothDescriptionOff: Your Bluetooth is turned off. Activate it to start Bluetooth matching.
intro.chatDescription: After logging in, you will see the list of Spontis with whom you have already chatted.
intro.chatEmpty: You don't have started any chats with other Spontis yet. Click on Chat in a Spontis's profile.
intro.contactFavorite: Here you can send friend requests or block other Spontis.
intro.contacts:
We match Spontis according to the following criteria, which you can specify in your settings:
  • Attributes you value in others
  • Age
  • Gender
  • Budget
  • favorite Locations
Don't forget Bluetooth Matching, which suggests Spontis with similar interests within 10 meters arround you.
intro.description:
More spontaneity needed? For example if:
  • You want to do something, but your friends don't have time
  • You are in another city and like to meet like minded
  • You enjoy organizing events where new Spontis are welcome to join
spontify.me is the right app for you in such cases.
intro.detail:
The detail page contains
  • contact data
  • describtion of the location
  • reachability of the location
  • map
  • various buttons to e.g. add locations to your favorites.
intro.eventNew:
• Choose a location (list above)
  • Location doesn't exist? Click enter Location
  • In the Location click Events at the bottom
  • Click Add new Event
intro.events:
Here you will find events from location operators as well as cool events from other Spontis. You can also create new Events yourself with a few clicks. You alone decide who can see the event:
  • Spontis with similar interests
  • All
For example, if you set up a regulars' table, other likeable Spontis may bring new impetus to your event.
intro.goToSettings:
Let's create your profile so that you can also get good matches here.
Clicking on the profile icon will take you to your profile.
intro.goToSettings2: A swipe to the left and you can enter attributes about yourself and locations.
intro.home:
Sometimes you want to get out of the rut and discover new things. ${appTitle} helps
  • to match contacts with same interests, e.g. dog lovers or concert goers
  • to find new locations/events through Guides
We do it in the following way...
intro.homeImage: Add your profile picture, a short self-description and other information here.
intro.homeLocation:
Enter new locations... advantages:
  • as soon as a Sponti clicks your location and fits to you, you receive a note and may get in contact
  • You will be informed about all events in your location

You see, it's worth it! Examples for locations:
  • a nice sight in the mountains
  • starting point of a cool bike tour
  • a new restaurant/museum
intro.listExplained:
Lists consist of the picture, information and the butterfly with
  • distance information including compass
  • category
  • favorite status
  • rating
By clicking the butterfly, you can rate the entry.
intro.listFilter:
Lists may be filtered by
  • categories
  • cardinal directions
  • districts
In contrast to the search, in which new data is fetched from the server, the filter only acts on the list elements that have already been loaded.
intro.listMenu:
The app follows these concepts
  • on the bottom you find the menu including Locations, Spontis, Search and What's up? (as soon as you are logged in, you see all of them)
  • Clicking on one of the menu items opens the submenu
intro.locations: Many cool locations already exist. Those that do not yet exist, e.g. your insider tips, may be created easily and events can be added with just a few clicks.
intro.menuOpen: You are back to the list. Click here to re-open the menu.
intro.notification: Here you will see your notifications.
intro.notificationEmpty: You do not have any notifications, yet.
intro.position: Here you can choose your location. For example, if you plan to be in another city tomorrow and want to see what's going on there, you select the city here and your location will be virtually moved there.
intro.register: After registration, we will show you how you can individualize your profile. Thank you for taking the time for this intro.
intro.settings:
Here you describe yourself and what you like. Based on this information we match:
  • Locations
  • Events
  • and Spontis
intro.settings2: Click here through the individual categories.
intro.settingsLoggedIn:
• Change your profile image and enter general information here
  • Swipe left to enter attributes that describe you and that you like about other Spontis
  • provide yourself as a guide for Spontis fitting your settings

login.hints:
As a registered user you can
  • see and chat with Spontis
  • find Spontis with similar interests within your immediate surrounding with Bluetooth Matching
  • find Guides or offer yourself as a guide
  • add locations to your favorites and receive notifications when Spontis, who suit you, are also interested in the location
  • participate in events or post your own
  • and much more

settings.bdayTooOld2: Wow, now you have managed {1} years in your life, and now this stupid computer program tells you that you are not allowed to sign up. settings.deleteProfileHint: Your data will be deleted forever after this confirmation. We only keep the reason for your deletion so that we can hopefully constantly improve. Please choose at least one reason:
settings.deleteReason6: don't understand the usefulness of the app
settings.genderUsingInterrestedIn: "Interested in" may only be used, when you enter your own gender.
settings.hintDeleteReason1: The app is brand new, can't you give us a few more months?
settings.hintDeleteReason2: With valuable input from you we can make the app easier. Would you like to support us?
settings.hintDeleteReason3: In the notifications above you can turn off specific notifications.
settings.hintDeleteReason4: If you report exactly these contacts to us, we can specifically write to them and warn them to block them if necessary. No reason to leave, is there?
settings.hintDeleteReason5: We're sorry, did our marketing give the wrong impression?
settings.hintDeleteReason6: We want to connect you to contacts with similar interest, no matter where you are in the world. No dating, no sex, life is so much more than just superficiality.
settings.hintDeleteReason7: Would you like to tell us what brought you here anyway?
